org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Class TestHRegion.HStoreForTesting

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HStore
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestHRegion.HStoreForTesting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf.ConfigurationObserver, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf.PropagatingConfigurationObserver, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.HeapSize, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.Store, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.StoreConfigInformation
    Enclosing class:
    TestHRegion

    public static class TestHRegion.HStoreForTesting
extends org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HStore
    HStoreForTesting is merely the same as HStore, the difference is in the doCompaction method of HStoreForTesting there is a checkpoint "hbase.hstore.compaction.complete" which doesn't let hstore compaction complete. In the former edition, this config is set in HStore class inside compact method, though this is just for testing, otherwise it doesn't do any help. In HBASE-8518, we try to get rid of all "hbase.hstore.compaction.complete" config (except for testing code).
